# SnappWord 截詞

> AI-powered LINE Bot that turns language-learning screenshots into structured vocabulary flashcards.

SnappWord lets users send screenshots from any language-learning app (Duolingo, Netflix, articles, etc.) to a LINE Bot. AI analyzes the image in ~7 seconds and returns beautiful flashcards with word, pronunciation, translation, context sentence, and example usage.

## Key Info

- Website: https://snappword.com
- Platform: LINE Messaging App (Bot)
- AI Engine: Google Gemini (multimodal image analysis)
- Supported Languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German
- Pricing: Free (30 screenshots/month), Sprout NT$99/month (200), Bloom NT$249/month (unlimited)
